channel.title: Making my server MySQL
channel.description: Is there a tutorial on how I can make my server MySQL so it connects to vB or MyBB?

item.title: Making my server MySQL
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

If you have database access, then yes. Although it will be tricky navigating through the tables because it won’t be easy to search through it. Is your goal to display information from the forums? You could link it to one post (the post ID theoretically shouldn’t change) and return the post contents, or you could use a completely seperate database system which might be easier to manage.

Read full topic
